product_name: Vasque St. Elias GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Although it's the lightest backpacking boot from Vasque, the men's St. Elias GTX is built to take on tough trails from the Alaskan wilderness to the rugged terrain of the Appalachian Trail. Traditional all-leather uppers combine with GORE-TEX(R) waterproof liners that let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements. Midsoles incorporate soft EVA footbeds; footbeds and midsoles absorb shock and provide all-day cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane shanks offer solid support and protect your feet from sharp rocks on rugged trails. Vasque St. Elias GTX hiking boots for men have lugged Vibram(R) rubber outsoles that supply stability and traction on rugged terrain.
short_description: Although it's the lightest backpacking boot from Vasque, the men's St. Elias GTX is built to take on tough trails from the Alaskan wilderness to the rugged terrain of the Appalachian Trail.
